servinfosub.title: System Description
servinfosub.ptxt: TCM turns TCC pressure control solenoid OFF under any of the following conditions.

item.ptxt: Engine coolant temperature is lower than 60 °C (140 °F).
4L/N switch (if equipped) is turned ON. (4L or N mode)
Brake light switch is turned ON. (Brake pedal is depressed)
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out with 2 persons, a driver and tester, on a level road.

action.ptxt: Perform DTC Flow to repair and retry.

test1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.

item.ptxt: For vehicle equipped with 4L/N switch, go to Step 4.
For vehicle equipped without 4L/N switch, go to Step 5.

action.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor, its circuit or engine cooling system. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch ON, check voltage between terminal “E92-4” of TCM connector and ground.

spec.title: 4L/N switch specification
spec.ptxt: Transfer gear position or “4H”: Battery voltage

action.ptxt: Faulty “4L” switch or its circuit. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch ON, check voltage between terminal “E61-34” of ECM connector and ground.

spec.title: Brake light switch specification
spec.ptxt: Brake pedal is depressed: Battery voltage

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Mis-adjusted brake light switch, faulty brake light switch or its circuit. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
